title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models, exposing chat, embed and tool-calling interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama via the REST API.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-driven TUI (Terminal UI) for interactive Ollama sessions written in Go.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose templates for CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to integrate Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Pythonic access to the Ollama API.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, and integrations around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread about the 0.4 release adding tool use and vision support.
